register.head: Sign up
register.heading: Create an accaunt
register.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
register.successAlertDescription: A verification email has been sent to your inbox. If you don't see the email, check your spam folder

login.head: Sign in
login.heading: Welcome back!
login.backButtonLabel: Don't have an account? Sign up!
login.loginDescription: Your username or email that you used during registration.
login.pinDescription: Enter the code from your authentication app.

resetPassword.heading: Password reset
resetPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
resetPassword.successAlertDescription: We have sent a link to reset your password to your email. If you have notifications enabled in Telegram, the link has been sent there as well
resetPassword.errorMessage: User with this email address was not found

newPassword.heading: New password
newPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
newPassword.passwordDescription: The password you used during registration
newPassword.passwordRepeatDescription: Repeat your new password for confirmation
newPassword.errorMessage: Error when setting a new password
